author: naijaboost
title: Update On Naijaboost
body:
![IMG_20171112_175242_718.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmaYQLaggnoL4zEyh7xbNGcuHDmhX6E8WfXJJ1RN2TbCkS/IMG_20171112_175242_718.jpg)

In the spirit of supporting a growing community, @naijaboost brings to you update on its activities.

The Naijaboost account which was created solely for Curation support purpose is still very much active with daily Curation of minimum of 40 accounts. The team has been extremely busy and tied up in keeping up their various communities as well as their their personal life, hence no regular update.
However, a regular update will  resume again so as to keep inform the activities of @naijaboost.

Despite the effort being put by Naijaboost and its team to support content creation using the nigerian tag. It is becoming a concern that the quality of content creation has dropped, now mostly limited to picture challenges, picture caption, motivational quotes and all sort. 
It is advisable that when posting a caption, pictures or motivational quote,  written text of detailed explanatio
root_title: Update On Naijaboost

body:

author: naijaboost
title: Naijaboost curation/Steem Power delegation update.
body:
In the light of supporting the growing community, @naijaboost brings you update on its SP delegation 
A couple of days ago, a post was put up requestion for suggestion to lease SP as it is very hard getting lease orders filled.

We are glad to announce that @naijaboost has been able to lease SP(10k SP). 
While we are still trying to secure more SP, you can support or suggest other means the account can get lease SP delegation.

A number of post(50+) were curated today. Hence forth there will be daily curation by @naijaboost and a daily curation update will be brought to your notice .

# Want to support this project;
Send Steem/SBD or delegate SP to @naijaboost.
You can also support by joining @naijaboost curation trail on steemauto

# The Team;
The team behind this project still remains @ceepee, @ejemai, @gbenga.
Technical Adviser @donkeypong.

Our appreciation goes to
@donkeypong.
Thank you for your support so far in making this project a success.

Any complains, suggestion, queries, please direct them to @
root_title: Naijaboost curation/Steem Power delegation update.

author: naijaboost
title: Naijaboost Update; Calling for paid(leased) SP delegation from kind steemians for its curation project
body:
**Here is another update from @naijaboost. We are having difficulty getting leased SP delegation. Hence there has been no curation.** 

**All effort by the team to get leased SP has proven not productive. The leasing market is very competive now and request orders are not been filled.**

# @naijaboost is calling on as many kind steemians as possible to support this great project with SP delegation. We are willing to pay for the SP delegation. 

**Please leave a comment or contact any of the team @ejemai, @ceepee, @gbenga and @donkeypong on steemit chat,  to support with SP delegation.**

**@naijaboost account is a non profiting curation project to help support and sustain the growth of Nigerians on the Nigerian steemit community. The team of 4 are solely responsible for funding the account with steem and steem power for curation purposes only.**
**Since the expiration of the last lease(two weeks ago) it has been difficult to get new leased SP delegation.**

# We need your support to help the project reach it
root_title: Naijaboost Update; Calling for paid(leased) SP delegation from kind steemians for its curation project

author: naijaboost
title: Update on @naijaboost.
body:
# In the light of supporting the growing Nigeria community, @naijaboost brings you curation update.
______
**@naijaboost is still very much functional and will still be serving its curation purpose.** 
**There is no curation by the naijaboost account. This is as a result of not been able to secure SP lease for the account, as the account is running on SP lease. At the moment all effort to get leased SP for the @naijaboost account has not yielded a positive result yet.**

**This update is to notify the Nigerian community and the entire steemit community. The team will continue its effort to get leased SP, for the naijaboost account.**

# Please, be free to suggest to @naijaboost team on how/where we can get SP lease. 

**Minnowbooster lease bot is saturated at the moment and lease orders are having a hard time getting filled.**

**Leave a comment on your suggestion or chat any of the team on steemit chat.**
_______
# Want to support this project;
Send Steem/SBD or delegate SP to @naijaboost.
You can also supp
root_title: Update on @naijaboost.

author: naijaboost
title: Naijaboost Curation Daily Update.
body:
As we all know, @naijaboost has been curating as much as it can take. Due to limitations to Voting Power, the account cannot curate every post carrying the Nigerian tag. 

Since the lunch of the @naijaboost curation, over 500 post have benefitted from its generous curation. 

We are glad to announce to you that @naijaboost will be giving daily update on curation.
The team behind the account will try as much as possible to give daily update on accounts that were curated. So as to maintain transparency.

There are days the account may go on break to recharge its voting power.

# Today's Accounts curated; Total of 40 post: 

@davidad, @destinysaid, @gloglo, @thelovejunkie, @mojubare, @dapeeyg, @smyle, @euronation, @adigun-anjola, @pretty-nelly, @obatala @funmiakinpelu @creon @camzy @kindsolo @beingnonye @gee-world, @bcrafts, @austinm, @bollutech, @mayowadavid, @greatness96, @teslim, @temmy8284, @the-commentator, @hillaryoki @mercy20, @samtickkz, @rotimi, @dante31, @steaks-info, @otemzi, @olufunke, @dabbey, @tej
root_title: Naijaboost Curation Daily Update.

author: naijaboost
title: Update on @Naijaboost curation report: @naijaboost just got a 30,000sp boost for you
body:
![IMG_20171114_093823_050.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmUxRQdr43CEFai8JNYrMcy7TxcDmUVn1MgVSafbKBW2To/IMG_20171114_093823_050.jpg)

Hello everyone!!!

@naijaboost got an update for you. 

It's been one week since the curation account was introduced and it has been curating with the 9,000SP from the support of @donkeypong and @hanshortfirst.
****
Today, we are are pleased to announce to you that the team( @ejemai, @gbenga and @ceepee) has put together some Steem to lease addition SP for curating the Nigerian community authors and the account is 30k SP strong.
****
Is been one week of curation and @naijaboost has so far enjoyed curating your work.
***
Join our Curation trail.
-----
To enhance and reduce the stress on the account's VP, please be kind to join @naijaboost curation trail on Steemauto.

Benefits of joining the @naijaboost curation trail.
----
1) You stand to gain Steem power from curation.
2) Your curating effect is felt largely thereby creating awareness and popularity for your account.(gain fo
root_title: Update on @Naijaboost curation report: @naijaboost just got a 30,000sp boost for you

author: naijaboost
title: Naijaboost Rules And Guide for Curation.
body:
![IMG_20171114_093823_050.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmUxRQdr43CEFai8JNYrMcy7TxcDmUVn1MgVSafbKBW2To/IMG_20171114_093823_050.jpg)

Hello everyone, @ceepee writing on behalf of the @naijaboost team,bringing to you **Rules and Guide** for curation with @naijaboost.
____
As has been introduced to the community, @naijaboost is solely for curation of content in the Nigeria community.

You will agree with us that curation is limited due to Voting Power(VP) and for this reason we are limited also.

Also, considering the standard on Steemit as regarding quality of content and plagiarism, we have hereby set up certain Rules/Guide to the curation works.

Rule and Guide to Naijaboost curation.
------

**1. Only Nigerian authors are eligible for curation from @naijaboost.**

**2. Only original content will be curated. Post will be severely screened for plagiarism.**

**3. In as much as leverage will be given to learning, quality of content substance will be a criteria for curation.**

**4. Due to limitations of voti
root_title: Naijaboost Rules And Guide for Curation.

author: naijaboost
title: Introducing @naijaboost, the Not For Profit curation service.
body:
<center>![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmf352XDGzfBRpxmvFXuUUhPL9xxzpQmRJ8kb6rFXNA2nc/image.png)</center>
**Hello everyone, I am **@naijaboost** and I am a **"Not For Profit Curation Service"** created by @ejemai, @gbenga and @ceepee to provide curation support services to the Nigerian community.**
***
My creators are great individuals who have the best interest of the Nigerian Community at heart, and seeing how rapidly it is growing, decided it is best [I am](steemit.com/@naijaboost) created to help support the various curation services available to the Nigerian Comunity. 
****
HOW READY AM I?
-----
It will interest you to know that **I am presently powered up with **8,255.419SP** by my Technical Adviser, @donkeypong for a period of 30 days. Thank you boss!
However, I do need more SP to get me functioning properly.**
****
**I am aware there are original contents and amazing authors on the Steemit patform and I am jut yearning to reward them for their work.**
****
MY VISION:
----
**To build a United Nigerian
root_title: Introducing @naijaboost, the Not For Profit curation service.
